subject: Collective Bargaining
College Athletics
Football (College)
Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
lead_paragraph: The key witness in a federal antitrust trial involving the athletic association has been an economics professor who has suggested that universities would be better off compensating players financially.
snippet: The key witness in a federal antitrust trial involving the athletic association has been an economics professor who has suggested that universities would be better off compensating players financially.
